// src/components/AccountsPayable/PurchaseOrderModal.jsx import React from 'react'; import { XCircle, CheckCircle, Edit, Download } from 'lucide-react'; import { getVendorName, getProductDetails, getPOStatusColor, formatCurrency } from '../../utils/apCalculations'; const PurchaseOrderModal = ({ purchaseOrder, onClose, vendors, products }) => { if (!purchaseOrder) return null; return (
{/* Header */}

Purchase Order Details - #{purchaseOrder.id}

{/* Body */}
{/* PO Info */}

{purchaseOrder.id}

PO-{purchaseOrder.POID}

{getVendorName(purchaseOrder.vendor_Id || purchaseOrder.Vendor_Id, vendors.data)}

{purchaseOrder.status}

{purchaseOrder.type || 'Standard PO'}

{formatCurrency( purchaseOrder.purchaseOrderItems.reduce( (sum, item) => sum + (item.totalPrice || 0), 0 ) )}

{purchaseOrder.remarks || 'No remarks'}

{/* Purchase Order Items */}

Purchase Order Items

{purchaseOrder.purchaseOrderItems.map((item, index) => { const product = getProductDetails(item.product_Id); return ( ); })}
Product Quantity Unit Price Total Price Status Remarks
{product.name}
{product.description && (
{product.description}
)}
{item.quantity} {formatCurrency(item.pricePerUnit)} {formatCurrency(item.totalPrice)} {item.status} {item.remarks || 'No remarks'}
Total: {formatCurrency(purchaseOrder.purchaseOrderItems.reduce((sum, item) => sum + (item.totalPrice || 0), 0))}
{/* Action Buttons */}
); }; export default PurchaseOrderModal;
